# Logistic Regression
Predict TRUE or FALSE, not a continuous value. The output is a probability from 0 to 1.

OLS uses sum of squared residuals (SSR). Logistic regression uses maximum likelihood.

Watch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XepXtl9YKwc and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p3T-_LMrvBc (second video for some math included) for explanation of maximum likelihood.
